abstract: Daniel Battsek’s departure comes after Disney eliminated about 50 jobs from the unit and cut the number of films it released each year to three.
snippet: Daniel Battsek’s departure comes after Disney eliminated about 50 jobs from the unit and cut the number of films it released each year to three.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The pilot light at Miramax keeps growing fainter.

headline.main: President Is Stepping Down From a Shrunken Miramax
headline.print_headline: President Is Stepping Down From a Shrunken Miramax
